changeEmail.name: Change email address
changeEmail.description: You want to change your email address for your cape
changeEmail.message:
Unfortunately, it is not currently possible to change the email address attached to your donator account. Emails cannot be changed due to security reasons, and because there is no functional way to actually change them.

If you clearly misspelt the domain name of your email when making the donation (`@gmial.com` instead of `@gmail.com`), we can manually fix that for you as it is an invalid email, but that is the only exception.

fixEmail.name: Spelt email incorrectly
fixEmail.description: You made a mistake and spelt your email wrong when donating

payment.message: Unfortunately, we are unable to help with payment issues. Only Paymentwall can provide support for payment related issues. You can contact them at `support@paymentwall.com`
